title: Dame Donny

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, disrupt the host's communication with players - replacing all night feedback with a link to <https://youtu.be/g3jCAyPai2Y> instead. (2 uses, 2 round cooldown)
- After any lynch occurs, you will be sent a list of the players who voted for the lynch target the following night. You may choose to force one of these people to listen to Baka Mitai on repeat, dealing a Powerful attack to them.
- If the person lynched was another Neutral Killing, you may attack two targets at night instead.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Redirect and roleblock immune.
- Any abilities that are deemed "sound-based" as according to the host have no effect on you.
- Players killed by you will have the death message *"Your ears were turned to mush by Dame Donny (3712)!"*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Force everyone to Baka Mitai all over their Dame Donny...

desc:
Post 3712
*Honma ni roku na otoko ya nai, soroi no yubiwa hazushimasu...*
